name: Cancelled games - pack
description:
This is a package made of six games that are either unfinished, or that are actually finished, but not to the standard that would make a developer proud. Still, some are fully playable and can be enjoyed by someone out there.

The games are:

1 - Mistery Falls - A mystery adventure - finished

2 - The world needs you - A sequel to Mystery Falls - Mostly finished

3 - Metaru gearu - unfinished

4 - Castlevania SQ - unfinished

5 - Castlevania Classic - Just an old mockup game - unfinished

6 - MDM - basically a joke game, really short.
